page.title: 15SPORTS DAY
page.content: WE WERE BEGINING TO PUT OUT OUR CHAIRS.I WAS ALL TENSE AND NERVOUS AND I HAD GOOSE PIMPLES ON MY LEGS. WHEN WE WENT INTO SCHOOL AFTER LUNCH PEOPLE WERE ARRIVING.THEN WE WENT OUT. I TALKED TO REBECCA ON THE WAY AND SHE DIDN'T KNOW IF SHE COULD BEAT ME. SOON ALL THE MUMS AND DADS WERE HERE AND WE STARTED THE SPRINTING RACES. WHEN IT CAME TO OUR RACE WE WALKED RIGHT TO THE TOP OF THE TRACK AND LINED UP.MR.CHORLTON SAID:'GET SET' AND 'GO!' WE ALL STARTED TO SPRINT OUR FASTEST. AT THE END REBECCA WAS GIVEN A CARD WITH '1ST'WRITTEN ON,MINE HAD '2ND'ON AND KERRY WAS THIRD. WE WENT TO A DESK AND MRS.HELLAWELL GAVE US A BADGE ,IN OUR TEAM COLOUR,WITH OUR POSITION ON.I PINNED MINE TO MY TEAM BAND AND WENT TO SHOW MY FRIENDS.
